articles.title: Of course, Grok’s AI companions want to have sex and burn down schools
articles.description: xAI's first AI companions on the Grok app are a lustful anime girl and a homicidal panda.

articles.description: The fund brings Mantis' assets under management to $225 million.

articles.description: Cameron Wagenius had already pleaded guilty to other charges earlier this year.

articles.title: A former OpenAI engineer describes what it’s really like to work there
articles.description: A senior engineer describes the thrill, chaos, and exhaustion of working at OpenAI this past year while launching its coding agent Codex.

articles.title: Meta fixes bug that could leak users’ AI prompts and generated content
articles.description: The tech giant fixed the security flaw, netting a security researcher $10,000 for privately disclosing the bug.

articles.title: The rights to Fyre Festival sold on eBay for $245K
articles.description: Billy McFarland, the fraudster who brought you Fyre Festival, has sold the rights to the brand on eBay for $245,300. We do not yet know who the buyer

articles.author: Russell Brandom

articles.title: Venture gets a rare Native American-led fund in Betsy Fore’s Velveteen Ventures
